Create Table of Journals Surveyed

Source: R/table_of_journals.R, R/table_of_scores.R
table_of_journals.Rd

Create Table of Journals Surveyed

Create Table of Article Scores

table_of_journals(rrpp)

table_of_journals(rrpp)

Arguments

rrpp

`data.frame` of article evaluations
rrpp

`data.frame` of article evaluations

Value

pander table of journals surveyed

pander table summarising article scores

Examples

rrpp <- gsheet::gsheet2tbl(
"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/19gXobV4oPZeWZiQJAPNIrmqpfGQtpapXWcSxaXRw1-M/edit#gid=1699540381"
)
table_of_journals(rrpp)
#> Error in .f(.x[[i]], ...): object 'reproducibility_score' not found


rrpp <- gsheet::gsheet2tbl(
"https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/19gXobV4oPZeWZiQJAPNIrmqpfGQtpapXWcSxaXRw1-M/edit#gid=1699540381"
)
table_of_scores(rrpp)
#> Error in table_of_scores(rrpp): could not find function "table_of_scores"
